alert.note: Alert for Southwest Utah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 11 at 5:58AM MST until December 12 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 11 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Southwest Utah. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 11 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected on most area roadways, particularly after sunset tonight. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will develop across western portions of the area this morning, spreading to Beaver, Cedar City and Milford by evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
